Package tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater

This library provides mechanism for updating Android applications and displaying messages configured at a configuration file.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener Provides callback methods for update check results.
Conditionally one of 4 methods will be called at the end of a update check: A new version is found, UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener.onUpdateCheckCompleted(UpdateManager, Update) A message should be displayed to user, UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener.onUpdateCheckCompleted(UpdateManager, Message) Completed successfully and no messages and no new versions found, UpdateManager.UpdateCheckListener.onUpdateCheckCompleted(UpdateManager) Update check is fail due to an error
UpdateManager.UpdateListener Provides callback methods for update process events.
UpdaterDialogManager.UpdaterUiListener Provide callback methods for update checking process.
 

Class Summary
Message Provides information about an deployable application package
MessageDescription Container for texts that are displayed on message dialog.
Properties Represents Device and application properties.
Update Provides information about an deployable application package
UpdateDescription Container for update message strings that are displayed in a update notification dialog.
UpdateManager Provides a auto update mechanism for Android applications
UpdaterDialogManager Provides a mechanism for checking updates and displaying notification dialogs to user when needed.
Usage example:
 

Exception Summary
UpdaterException  
 

Package tr.com.turkcellteknoloji.turkcellupdater Description

This library provides mechanism for updating Android applications and displaying messages configured at a configuration file.
See UpdaterDialogManager for usage.
See Configuration Reference for configuration details.
